reviews.review_msg: One of the most unprofessional EDUC faculty. Has zero ability to connect with students and would constantly try to force students to answer questions about their personal lives in ways that were neither relevant nor trauma informed. She consistantly complains that students are not there, and yet simultaneously belittles the students who do show up.
Claire was an excellent Prof for 455!

Claire was an amazing Prof for EDUC 355! The weekly classes are full of theatre games taught by students in class each week. The overall structure focuses on weekly blog style posts on Canvas instead of a research papers, a performance review of a play, and a final group performance. Claire is very kind and approachable, highly recommend!

Claire is a very though professor. She tends to have a very narrow view of activities and how the class should work, which hinders student's creativity. Activities are very tough and she will ask you to hand in your assignment 2 or 3 times. Also, the class barely discusses theatre and it's just games and improv. Not recommended.
